change.item: Converted from dtd to schema and transformed with AT-import-fixer.xsl

PUBLIC "-//David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library//TEXT (US::NDD::::Brouillard Communications, Inc. Vertical Files)//EN" "brouillardvertfile" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2003-10-15).

Also, the top level of the finding aid (above the dsc) changed to conform to current Rubenstein Library and NC EAD standards as laid out in the Inventory Style Guide and in the NCEAD Best Practice Guidelines. Within the dsc, dates for series were normalized. These changes were made by Michelle Belden.
Also, container TYPE and LABEL attribute values were standardized according to the Rubenstein Library EAD 2002 manual and the NCEAD eadlocal.ent by Ruth E. Bryan.
The tag list inside index was changed to indexentry by Ruth E. Bryan.

did.unittitle: Brouillard Communications, Inc. Vertical Files circa 1973-2000

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
Also, some of the materials in this collection are not immediately accessible, because they require further processing before use.
Furthermore, all or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. There may be a 48-hour delay in obtaining these materials.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Brouillard Communications, Inc. Vertical Files, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Brouillard Communications, Inc. Vertical Files were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2003.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Josh Kaiser; Ann Langford; Danielle McGregor; Kate Crassons
Completed April 29, 2003
Encoded by Elizabeth Arnold
This collection is unprocessed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Advertising agency founded in 1968 as a division of the J. Walter Thompson Company, specializing in corporate advertising and corporate image advertising for major American and multinational firms.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists primarily of corporate image advertisements clipped from magazines and newspapers, including trade journals and business newspapers. Organized into two series of alphabetical files: by industry and by company name. Major industry categories represented include computers, fashion accessories, liquor, insurance, mutual funds, and telecommunications. Major companies include AT&T, Du Pont, General Electric, IBM, Kodak, RJR Nabisco, and Xerox; most companies represented were clients or prospective clients. Also includes advertising tearsheets; articles; and unpublished reports about major corporations or industries. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising and Marketing History.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For more information, see the J. Walter Thompson Company Domestic Advertisements collection and the Thomas F. Garbett Papers, 1951-1992 and undated (bulk 1975-1985), in the Duke University. David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.
